Name: Tripel
Review Text: Really cozy atmosphere and very friendly bartenders! This place has the typical 'bruin café' (brown cafe) feel to it. They have an upstairs area as well, part of which overlooks the ground floor. Their assortment of beers is very extensive. I really recommend anyone to try this place!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Beautiful! 3rd visit. Went tonight (tuesday) 2 for 1 on steaks,  and just amazing! Chill and homey vibe and very friendly. Value for money would be a great understatment. Must visit for steak and beer lovers!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great Belgium beer bar! Such a large variety of beers!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Just like its little brother, De Zotte, it has a great beer selection and a reduced but tasty menu. The ambience is very nice and the place ample enough to handle big groups. Proost!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Cozy and warm, this bar has a laid back atmosphere with a great selection of Belgian and Dutch beers. The rock music completes the scene really well

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great selection, but too hot inside.  Expect 1 bar tender.. but that firey blond needs to be cloned or brain scanned for future robot bar tenders  (or like robo bar assistance).  Bloody hell you need more bartenders and a bigger bloody fan!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Cozy environment and a nice selection of beers (although they usually don't have most of the interesting beers from the menu). The food is good enough.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Cool original Amsterdam bar and cafe. With a private room upstairs that you can rent for all purposes. And a wide selection of beers.mostly local people. Definitely a recommendation if.yiu are in this corner of amsterdam

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Nice and cosy with a great selection of beers. Sometimes the food can be a bit disappointing but Monday and Tuesday is 2-for-1 which is always good value

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great beer selection, friendly Belgian atmosphere in Amsterdam. Check out the second meal free on Monday and Tuesdays, the chicken is a winner.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Used to be my favorite place until they started charging €5,50 a beer. Still #1 spot if you like Belgian ales.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great beers on tap! Friendly staff

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Amazing Belgian beer selection. Great vibe. Good snacks. Open late. Nice place!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Cosy relaxed atmosphere, friendly staff and fantastic beer selection. Great Belgian beers choices

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great selection of beers.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great selection of beers, good food, nice atmosphere.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great deal on Mondays and tuesdays, however had to wait over an hour and a half for our food and saw mouse in the kitchen... the money you might save in food you spend in beers as you have to wait so much to get your food.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Best beer selection in the city! Atmosphere is great as well. A must see for all travelers

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great variety of beers, friendly personnel and a cool place to relax

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great beers, great vibe and fab staff that go the extra mile ;) even if u lost ur backpack at 4am.. Thank u! :D

Name: Tripel
Review Text: A huge variety of beers and an interesting menu for dinner. Good to go with friends or a date.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Often playing good records, always many beers. Steeply priced for some special beers, but a good deal on food!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Many beer choices and lovely staff but very few options of side dishes.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: A rabbit hole. Great selection of beers. You may find a good atmosphere there.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great atmosphere and delicious veggie burgers.  The beers are very overpriced.  Even for the center of Amsterdam.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Good place for a drink and snacks. Great selection of beers.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Delicious food, great variety of beers and good service!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Good beer and nice food, though the restaurant was cold and service missed a bit extra

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Very good vibe, exceptional variety of beers, very nice food and awesome staff!

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great selection of Belgian beers,  laid back atmosphere, excellent music (rock'n'roll to post punk)

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Great selection of beers! Good food and big enough for celebrations

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Fun place for a Friday evening! There are many options available for Belgium beers.

Name: Tripel
Review Text:
Good food - Good Service - Nice waitresses
Place is nice and cosy.
Will suggest to at least try once ;)

Name: Tripel

Review Text: Great beer place on the same street where historic club Korsakoff used to be.

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Very good belgium beers. Monday and tuesday: 2 meals for the price of 1

Name: Tripel
Review Text: Good atmosphere, a little hot inside, a good choice of beers
